category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_TEMPLATE_DATE
preference.preference_description: Specifies the start date of schedules created from a template. Valid Values: true - Specifies the start date of the template is used as the start date of the new schedules created from it. This is the default value. false - Specifies the current date is used as the start date of the new schedules.
